title: Development/redevelopment of a vacant plot belonging to a private landholder for constructing staff quarters for a user Authority shall be permitted by the Municipal Commissioner with prior approval of the location and requirement of such Staff Quarters by the Committee formed for this purpose by GoM
clause_text: Development/redevelopment of a vacant plot belonging to a private landholder for constructing staff quarters for a user Authority shall be permitted by the Municipal Commissioner with prior approval of the location and requirement of such Staff Quarters by the Committee formed for this purpose by GoM.
section: 33(3) Buildings of Government/MCGM/Statutory Bodies, Semi- Government and PSU Offices:
